Our Test Kitchen Is Going Live on YouTube! | Bon Appétit




Skip to main contentOpen Navigation MenuMenuStory SavedTo revisit this article, visit My Profile, then View saved stories.Close AlertCloseStory SavedTo revisit this article, select My Account, then View saved storiesClose AlertCloseSign InSearchRecipesCookingCultureShoppingRestaurantsBA MarketVideosPodcastMerch ShopcultureOur Test Kitchen Is Going Live on YouTube!Join us at 7 p.m. EST Friday May 1 for a live event benefiting World Central Kitchen.By The Bon Appétit StaffApril 29, 2020FacebookTwitterEmailFacebookTwitterEmailCome hang with Brad, Claire, Sohla, Chris and the rest of the BA Test Kitchen crew during our first-ever LIVE show. There will be cooking challenges! There will be cute pets! There will (possibly) be tears! And it’s all to raise money to support World Central Kitchen’s response to Covid-19: providing fresh meals to those in need, putting restaurants back to work, and feeding frontline healthcare workers.Follow along right here, beginning at 7 p.m. EST on Friday, May 1!Explore Bon AppétitCoronavirusTest KitchenRecipes you want to make. Cooking advice that works.
